::KitKat::

"Yeah well, I won't be worth scrap if I can't get this arm replaced." 
She looked at the stump of what used to her her arm, or in beast 
mode, her leg. She sighed. If she wan't able to fight, she wasn't 
worth the metal she was made out of.
"Can either of you two help me fix this. I just have to be able to 
fight." She sat down on her haunches and looked at both Stingtra and 
Drillbit.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit thought for a moment.
> "Terrorsaur pulled you out of the fight, so he must of put you in 
the
> CR. And it's deffinetaly a good thing that you're allive." He said,
> seeing if she would pick up the fact that he had a crush on her.
